## Intro

When I was buildings app and dashboard in R, with Shiny and Quarto, I was struggeling that my product should run in an external server of someone else. Such that, my data were/are stored in servers which I don't know where they phsyical are.
For a reliable chooise, I'm currently hosting my website on Github Pages, but it has some costraints: first of all that it allows only static web sites, so forget of beatiful and dinamicalm dashboards.
So, I decided to setup a own server, that at the end could be just your old laptop or, as in my case, a cheap Raspberry Pi 5.

In this article, I'm going to show how I configured and built everything. Starting
